title: Life Changes & Experiences
description: Learn vocabulary for talking about life changes, experiences, and personal growth.

words.meaning: something that happens to you; to have something happen to you
words.example: Living abroad was an amazing experience.
words.exampleTranslation: 해외 생활은 놀라운 경험이었어요.

words.meaning: to succeed in doing something after effort
words.example: She achieved her goal of running a marathon.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀는 마라톤 완주 목표를 달성했어요.

words.meaning: a chance to do something
words.example: This job offers great opportunities for growth.
words.exampleTranslation: 이 직업은 성장할 좋은 기회를 제공해요.

words.meaning: something difficult that tests your abilities
words.example: Learning a new language is a big challenge.
words.exampleTranslation: 새 언어를 배우는 것은 큰 도전이에요.

words.meaning: to succeed in dealing with a problem
words.example: He overcame his fear of public speaking.
words.exampleTranslation: 그는 대중 연설에 대한 두려움을 극복했어요.

words.meaning: a choice that you make after thinking
words.example: Moving to a new city was a difficult decision.
words.exampleTranslation: 새 도시로 이사하는 것은 어려운 결정이었어요.

words.meaning: to feel sorry about something you did or didn't do
words.example: I regret not studying harder in school.
words.exampleTranslation: 학교에서 더 열심히 공부하지 않은 것을 후회해요.

words.meaning: to change to fit new conditions
words.example: It took time to adapt to the new job.
words.exampleTranslation: 새 직장에 적응하는 데 시간이 걸렸어요.

words.meaning: to become or make something better
words.example: My English has improved a lot this year.
words.exampleTranslation: 올해 제 영어가 많이 향상됐어요.

words.meaning: lack of success in doing something
words.example: Don't be afraid of failure - it helps you learn.
words.exampleTranslation: 실패를 두려워하지 마세요 - 배움에 도움이 돼요.

words.meaning: achieving what you wanted or intended
words.example: Hard work is the key to success.
words.exampleTranslation: 열심히 일하는 것이 성공의 열쇠예요.

words.meaning: feeling sure about yourself and your abilities
words.example: She became more confident after the training.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀는 훈련 후에 더 자신감이 생겼어요.

words.meaning: to complete studies; a person who has completed studies
words.example: I graduated from university two years ago.
words.exampleTranslation: 저는 2년 전에 대학을 졸업했어요.

words.meaning: moving to a higher position at work
words.example: She got a promotion after working there for three years.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀는 3년 근무 후 승진했어요.

words.meaning: to stop working because of age
words.example: My father retired at the age of 65.
words.exampleTranslation: 아버지는 65세에 은퇴하셨어요.

words.meaning: worth remembering; very special
words.example: Our trip to Japan was truly memorable.
words.exampleTranslation: 일본 여행은 정말 기억에 남아요.

words.meaning: to succeed in completing something
words.example: What do you want to accomplish this year?
words.exampleTranslation: 올해 무엇을 이루고 싶으세요?

words.meaning: to try hard to do something difficult
words.example: I struggled to find a job after graduation.
words.exampleTranslation: 졸업 후 취업하는 데 어려움을 겪었어요.

words.meaning: able to do things by yourself without help
words.example: Living alone made me more independent.
words.exampleTranslation: 혼자 살면서 더 독립적이 됐어요.

words.meaning: something you must do as part of your duty
words.example: Parenthood comes with many responsibilities.
words.exampleTranslation: 부모가 되면 많은 책임이 따라요.

words.meaning: the possibility of something bad happening
words.example: Starting a business involves some risk.
words.exampleTranslation: 사업을 시작하는 것은 어느 정도 위험이 따라요.

words.meaning: very useful or worth a lot
words.example: This was a valuable learning experience.
words.exampleTranslation: 이것은 가치 있는 학습 경험이었어요.

words.meaning: something you do wrong
words.example: Everyone makes mistakes - that's how we learn.
words.exampleTranslation: 누구나 실수해요 - 그렇게 배우는 거예요.

words.meaning: the energy you use to do something
words.example: It takes a lot of effort to learn a language.
words.exampleTranslation: 언어를 배우는 데는 많은 노력이 필요해요.

words.meaning: to change completely
words.example: Travel has transformed my view of the world.
words.exampleTranslation: 여행은 세상을 보는 제 시각을 바꿔놨어요.

words.meaning: to try to achieve something over time
words.example: She decided to pursue her dream of becoming a doctor.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀는 의사가 되겠다는 꿈을 추구하기로 했어요.

words.meaning: an important event in development or progress
words.example: Getting married was a major milestone in their lives.
words.exampleTranslation: 결혼은 그들 인생의 중요한 이정표였어요.

words.meaning: a trip or the process of traveling; a process of change
words.example: Life is a journey, not a destination.
words.exampleTranslation: 인생은 목적지가 아니라 여정이에요.

words.meaning: the ability to develop or achieve something
words.example: She has the potential to become a great leader.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀는 훌륭한 리더가 될 잠재력이 있어요.

words.meaning: the quality of continuing to try despite difficulties
words.example: His determination helped him finish the race.
words.exampleTranslation: 그의 결단력이 경주를 마치는 데 도움이 됐어요.

words.meaning: a problem that delays or stops progress
words.example: The injury was a major setback in his career.
words.exampleTranslation: 부상은 그의 경력에 큰 차질이었어요.

words.meaning: a small change made to adapt to a new situation
words.example: Moving to a new country requires many adjustments.
words.exampleTranslation: 새 나라로 이사하면 많은 적응이 필요해요.

words.meaning: a strong desire to achieve something
words.example: Her ambition is to become a successful entrepreneur.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀의 포부는 성공한 기업가가 되는 거예요.

words.meaning: the process of changing from one state to another
words.example: The transition from student to worker was challenging.
words.exampleTranslation: 학생에서 직장인으로의 전환은 도전적이었어요.

words.meaning: something good you get for doing something well
words.example: Hard work brings its own rewards.
words.exampleTranslation: 열심히 일하면 그에 따른 보상이 있어요.

words.meaning: giving up something important for something else
words.example: Success often requires sacrifice.
words.exampleTranslation: 성공은 종종 희생을 요구해요.

words.meaning: something difficult that you succeed in doing
words.example: Winning the competition was a great achievement.
words.exampleTranslation: 대회 우승은 큰 성취였어요.

words.meaning: a particular way of thinking about something
words.example: Travel gives you a new perspective on life.
words.exampleTranslation: 여행은 인생에 대한 새로운 시각을 줘요.

words.meaning: the process of developing or improving
words.example: Personal growth is more important than money.
words.exampleTranslation: 개인적 성장이 돈보다 더 중요해요.

words.meaning: spending a lot of time and energy on something
words.example: Her dedication to her work is admirable.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀의 일에 대한 헌신은 존경스러워요.

words.meaning: the effect that something has on someone or something
words.example: The teacher had a positive impact on my life.
words.exampleTranslation: 그 선생님은 제 인생에 긍정적인 영향을 미쳤어요.

words.meaning: movement toward a goal or improvement
words.example: She's making good progress in learning Korean.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀는 한국어 학습에 좋은 진전을 보이고 있어요.

words.meaning: the quality of behaving like a sensible adult
words.example: Living independently helped develop his maturity.
words.exampleTranslation: 독립적으로 사는 것이 그의 성숙함을 키우는 데 도움이 됐어요.

words.meaning: a promise to do something; dedication
words.example: Marriage requires commitment from both partners.
words.exampleTranslation: 결혼은 양쪽 파트너의 헌신이 필요해요.

words.meaning: something you learn from experience
words.example: That mistake taught me an important lesson.
words.exampleTranslation: 그 실수는 저에게 중요한 교훈을 줬어요.

words.meaning: the state of not being sure about something
words.example: There's a lot of uncertainty about the future.
words.exampleTranslation: 미래에 대한 불확실성이 많아요.

words.meaning: the reason or enthusiasm for doing something
words.example: Her motivation to succeed is very strong.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀의 성공 의욕은 아주 강해요.

words.meaning: the ability to recover quickly from difficulties
words.example: Her resilience helped her overcome many obstacles.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀의 회복력이 많은 장애물을 극복하는 데 도움이 됐어요.

words.meaning: an important discovery or development
words.example: The scientist made a major breakthrough in research.
words.exampleTranslation: 그 과학자는 연구에서 큰 돌파구를 마련했어요.

words.meaning: a feeling of satisfaction from achieving something
words.example: Helping others gives me a sense of fulfillment.
words.exampleTranslation: 남을 돕는 것이 저에게 성취감을 줘요.

exercises.question: She worked hard and finally _____ her goal of becoming a manager.
Moving to a new country is a big _____.
It took him months to _____ his fear of flying.
I _____ not spending more time with my grandparents.
After the training, she became more _____ in her abilities.
Learning from your _____ is important for growth.
The trip to Paris was a truly _____ experience.
It takes a lot of _____ to learn something new.
She decided to _____ her passion for art and become a painter.
Getting your driver's license is an important _____.
The _____ from school to work life can be difficult.
인생은 여정이에요.
She has great _____ to become a professional musician.
His _____ helped him never give up on his dream.
The injury was a major setback.
Moving abroad requires a big _____.
Her _____ is to open her own restaurant someday.
Hard work brings its own _____.
성공은 종종 희생을 요구해요.
Graduating from university was a great _____.
Travel gives you a new _____ on life.
Personal growth is very important.
Her _____ to her students is remarkable.
The teacher had a positive _____ on my life.
그녀는 한국어 학습에 좋은 진전을 보이고 있어요.
exercises.answer: She's making good progress in learning Korean.

exercises.question: Living independently helped develop his _____.
Marriage requires _____ from both partners.
That mistake taught me an important lesson.
exercises.answer: 그 실수는 저에게 중요한 교훈을 줬어요.
